Package org.planit.event.management

Interface EventHandler

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BPRLinkTravelTimeCost, CapacityConstrainedAssignment, CapacityConstrainedTrafficAssignmentBuilder, CapacityRestrainedAssignment, CapacityRestrainedTrafficAssignmentBuilder, ConnectoidTravelTimeCost, Demands, DeterministicTrafficAssignment, FixedConnectoidTravelTimeCost, FundamentalDiagram, InitialLinkSegmentCost, InitialPhysicalCost, LinkTravelTimeCost, MacroscopicNetwork, ManualInitialLinkSegmentCost, MSASmoothing, NetworkLoading, NewellFundamentalDiagram, NodeModel, PhysicalCost, PhysicalNetwork, Smoothing, SpeedConnectoidTravelTimeCost, TampereNodeModel, TraditionalStaticAssignment, TrafficAssignment, TrafficAssignmentBuilder, TrafficAssignmentComponent, TrafficAssignmentComponentFactory, VirtualCost, Zoning
    public interface EventHandler
    Objects must implement this interface if they are required to handle events Note that the EventManager which is injected must be a singleton for the application. This means it must have been instantiated by the top-level project, which then injects it into every object which needs it.
    Author:
    gman6028

      Injects the event manager
